EmailTemplate.name: 21_IMU_GH_Q1-Recap-Newsletter_Email.Email #1
EmailTemplate.subject: HGuide Highlights: Enhancing Mobile Mapping Point Clouds, Tips to Buying an Inertial Navigation System and More
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace Portal <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]> | View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Forward to a friend <[[{{system.forwardToFriendLink}}]]>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there},
In this edition of HGuide Highlights, we show you how to enhance point clouds using the robotic operating system and our HGuide n580, the five things you should consider before buying an inertial navigation system, and we take a look into one of our mobile mapping customers who uses our HG4930 IMU to increase navigation accuracy. Enhance Point Clouds With The Honeywell HGuide n580
For companies in surveying and mapping, generating accurate point clouds is critical when creating mapping systems.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/enhance-point-clouds-with-hguide-n580]]>
5 Things to Consider Before Buying an Inertial Navigation System
There’s a lot of factors to consider before buying an inertial navigation system and designing it into your application.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/consider-inertial-navigation-system-infographic]]> Mobile Mapping Success
LiDAR USA integrates and manufactures high-performance LiDAR systems and mapping software on UAVs and vehicles.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/customer-success-stories/2020/08/lidar-greater-location-accuracy-honeywell-imu]]>
HGuide Customer Support
Here you’ll find Frequently Asked Questions covering all our HGuide products, ranging from software to accessories and more.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/hguide-customer-support]]> Have a question about one of our products?
We're here to help. Contact our HGuide sales team with your question and someone will be with you shortly.
Contact us <[[mailto:HGuide.sales@honeywell.com]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/honeywell_aero/]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellDefense]]>
